description: MaeJoo Hathaway is a platform that provides financial market data and stock analysis, featuring tools for tracking stock prices and predicting market trends. Using models like ARIMA and GARCH, it offers insights into price movements and volatility.The platform aims to support users in making informed financial decisions
arimaDescription: The ARIMA model (AutoRegressive Integrated Moving Average) is a popular statistical method used for time series forecasting. It combines three components: AutoRegression (AR), Integration (I), and Moving Average (MA).
garchDescription: The GARCH model (Generalized Autoregressive Conditional Heteroskedasticity) is a statistical model used for analyzing and forecasting the volatility of time series data. GARCH is used to model and predict variance (volatility) over time, particularly in financial markets.
